name: Martha Wayne
description: Martha Wayne is a key figure in the Batman universe, known for her tragic murder which motivates Bruce Wayne to become Batman.

content.title: Background
content.body: **Martha Wayne** was born into the affluent Kane family, one of Gotham City's most prestigious and wealthiest families. She became a renowned socialite and philanthropist, known for her charitable work in Gotham's underprivileged areas. Martha married Thomas Wayne, head of the Wayne Enterprises, and together they had a son, Bruce Wayne.

content.title: Story Role
content.body: In *Batman Begins*, Martha Wayne's tragic death alongside her husband Thomas in a mugging gone wrong becomes a pivotal moment in the narrative. Her murder is the catalyst for Bruce Wayne's transformation into Batman, serving as the emotional drive for his quest against crime in Gotham City.

content.title: Relationships
content.body: Martha Wayne was married to **Thomas Wayne** (UUID: d2d9f803-43f7-46d1-97db-b23e5b62ad84) and was the mother of **Bruce Wayne** (UUID: d1637915-9c46-4f38-af8b-6932a49e3746). Her relationship with her son, while loving and nurturing, is tragically cut short.
